name: Irio
appearance: Wind-tangled hair threaded with air-moss filaments, sun-browned skin dusted with green pollen, ankle harnesses and a rope-belt of tools.
character: Bold and quick with a grin; loyalty is earned by keeping your line taut in a squall.
talents: lands in crosswinds without a scrape
makes friends on any quay in a night
dreams: Build a sky-chain to inland markets so pirates can be ignored
Prove air trade can out-earn marrow exports
secrets: Flew moon-iron nodules under tarps for Neth—then panicked and dumped them mid-flight
Lets Ketta adjust manifests to flag suspect cargo without tipping off bosses
Carries a Pilgrim knot hidden in his boot for luck though he laughs about superstition
